parameters:
\N<Segi>This is the middle layer of the ruins... How far do these
ruins extend? And what were they made for, I wonder...

\N<Segi>If I proceed further, will I find the answer? But... even if
that's the case, it has nothing to do with me.

\N<Segi>My role isn't to traverse these ruins. It's to train myself
here and rescue Lord Yuia and the others. I have no doubts
about that...

There are strange creatures within the ruins that are
enemies to Segi, but contact with them will not result in a
game over, except for slip damage.

However, under certain conditions, if she is injured and
collapses, some kind of danger may befall her.

Additionally, among the roaming enemies and treasure chests,
there are individuals with special colors.

These individuals, while random, generally offer better
rewards compared to those of normal color.
